channel.title: Testscape on a linux webserver?
channel.description:
How would i put testscape on a linux webserver.
I presume i need to change the batch file to a sh, but i don't know how how would i do this?
Also would i need to use shell.
Also would a jar file run on linux?
Does someone have a tut?
Thank you![br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 01:08:53 PM[/size][hr]Greatly appreciate any help.
